alert.note: Alert for South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 6:03PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pinal County through 645 PM MST... At 600 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Chui-Chu, or 23 miles south of Casa Grande, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph resulting in areas of blowing dust...especially along Route 15 in the northern Tohono Oodham Nation. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chui-Chu, North Komelik, Kohatk, Jack Rabbit and Shopishk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells
